name: Employee Management Application
summary: Help business store employee information and help managers manage employees weekly schedule in an easy to use format.
tools: ReactJS, Axios, Express, Node, Firebase, Mongoose, Robo 3T, Nodemon, Concurrently, React Bootstrap, Moment, Material-UI, Syncfusion, Dotenv, NPM, Heroku, VsCode, CSS, and Github

name: Google Book Search
summary: This application searches for books and save a list of books that the user might be interested in buying or reading.
tools: React, Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js, CSS, React-Bootstrap, Material-UI-Bootstrap, Axios, Dotenv, Robo3T, VsCode, Github, Heroku, Google Books API

name: Clicky Game
summary: The goal of the game is simple, using your mouse, CLICK each of the twelve character cards in whatever order you chose - the order does not matter, only that you do not click the same card twice!
tools: React, Bootstrap, CSS, Visual Studio Code, and Github

name: POS System
summary: Using my restaurant experience to create a better Point of Sale System (POS). To use this application you would need a login password that must be create using the manager password. There is also a password to login as a cashier so that you do not see the manager settings. The current manager password is 8 and cashier password is 0.
tools: JQuery, Node, API, Moment, Axios, MySQL, Express, CSS, Bootstrap, VsCode, GitHub, Heroku

name: News Scraping Application
summary: This app allows users to view Infoworld News articles and comment of the articles and save it so we can view it later.  Each article displayed includes a headline which is also a link to the source article and a description.
tools: Node, Express, Axios, Cheerio, MongoDB/Mongoose, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, HTML, Heroku, Github, and Vs Code.

name: Artist Discovery
summary: Artist Discovery, is a front end app created using ticketmaster's API, along with Itunes' Search Api. This web app allows its users to look up an artist and discover their music. A dropdown menu allows users to pick specific dates to look up tours or events that the artist is having within that time frame.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Ticket Master API and Itunes Search API.
